import React, { Component } from "react"; import '../App.css' import { MDBContainer, MDBTabPane, MDBTabContent, MDBNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink } from "mdbreact"; import { fetchElectronics, fetchProducts, fetchFashion } from '../actions/index' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class TabsDefault extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.fetchProducts(); } state = { activeItem: "1" }; toggle = (tab) => { if (this.state.activeItem !== tab) { this.setState({ activeItem: tab }); } }; render() { const { products } = this.props; // console.log(products); return ( this.toggle("1")} role="tab" > All this.toggle("2",this.props.fetchFashion())} role="tab" > Fashion this.toggle("3")} role="tab" > Electronics
{products[0] && products[0].map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{products[1] && products[1].map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{products[2] && products[2].map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { // console.log(state); return { products:state.products } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,{fetchProducts,fetchElectronics,fetchFashion}) (TabsDefault);
